entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , New Tecumseth
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 5:52 PM EST Monday 20 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -1.5°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Egbert 5:00 PM EST Monday 20 February 2023
Temperature: -1.5°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.8 kPa rising
Humidity: 69 %
Wind Chill: -6
Dewpoint: -6.4°C
Wind: NNW 12 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Monday night: A few clouds. Low minus 7.
entry.summary: Clear. Becoming partly cloudy this evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 7. Wind chill minus 12 overnight. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Monday 20 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of flurries. High plus 1. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy. Flurries beginning in the morning and ending near noon then 40 percent chance of flurries in the afternoon. Local amount 2 cm. Wind southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming southwest 20 gusting to 40 then west 40 gusting to 60 near noon. High plus 1. Wind chill minus 11 in the morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Monday 20 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Cloudy. Low minus 7.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light in the evening. Low minus 7. Wind chill near minus 10. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Monday 20 February 2023
